select CAST(KitColorKey as DECIMAL (10,0)) as F_PRODUCT_COLOR,CAST(KitRetailBrandNameKey as DECIMAL (10,0)) as F_PRODUCT_RETAIL_BRAND,
* from [Retail].[EDWProductKit]

,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'

,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'ProducMastertLoad'
